As CCO & Marketing Director for the Aclipsa Video Platform, I provide the creative vision, product design, and market direction for our team. I work closely with our software teams, e-commerce teams, and our business development team to meet the needs of businesses requiring safe and private video delivery to their employee pools. The Aclipsa software system was build from the ground up to be a scalable SaaS solution for businesses requiring videos for training, information, education, and compliance.  I was CCO of the original software firm that designed and built the SaaS system, iOS and Android apps before joining Aclipsa. Working with this unique team and technology allows me to explore new and innovative ways to build, market to, and develop channels inside medium to large companies, while being an integral part of the user experience and overall design of the product as we continue to expand its reach.

The Purple Society is a childhood cancer foundation dedicated to helping families fighting childhood cancer find resources. Our interactive tools and educational programs help the families make better decisions about treatments. Our website delivers valuable information and allows for families to stay connected during treatment. I manage one of the largest most well respected patient support websites in the world. I also spearhead the creation and build out of our interactive tools and applications. Many of which are used daily by children's hospitals and patients around the world.

As Chief Creative Officer (CCO) for Software Ops I provide a comprehensive vision for the Software Ops brand and product channels. I work directly with my software engineers on complex SaaS Cloud Platforms and the native mobile apps they power. Utilizing external and internal resources to forecast future direction and maintain knowledge of trend, market, and technology is central to my position. I provide creative leadership, direction and inspiration to the Software Ops team in a manner that achieves key business metrics such as revenue, margin, and productivity goals. Lastly, I work with Biz Dev to ensure that creative, thematic consistency and brand DNA are reflected in all of the product lines and sales channels.

As CCO for a boutique agency, my goal is to lead the team to success! My day includes concept design, UX & UI design, communication design, and interactive development for our clients. With a talented team of 20 designers and developers; We are small enough to be nimble, yet big enough to make a difference in the crowded interactive space! At RUYO we focus on: branding, website design and development, private and virtual private hosting, online marketing, social marketing, e-commerce, and membership affinity.  We deliver all of your digital content, to any device, anywhere in the world...and we make it look GOOD! Visit www.ruyo.cool for more information about how we can help your business!

Lead the Titan Media team in areas such as technology development, design standards, product development, distribution channel management, marketing communications (including advertising and promotions), market research, and project system analysis. Manage the large in-house team of developers and media buyers on the priorities and/or resources of Titan's marketing strategy. This position has merged into the Chief Creative Officer at RUYO Interactive during the company expansion into new markets.

You can spot someone special when they act selflessly and strive to only do what is best for others; both personally and professionally. I have experienced this in working with Anthony first hand. Passion and purpose are two words that describe him best. Anthony positively impacts the lives of families in need right here in Arizona everyday. The world needs more Anthony's.

summary: I am hyper focused on technical innovation and digital growth strategies for the brands I represent. Creating a compelling and emotionally driven product engagement is at the core of each project I am a part of. Whether developing a complex SaaS system, a native app, brand identity, or a web presence, with over a two decades of experience, the depth and breadth of insight I bring to a project is second to none. I have had the great pleasure of working with companies such as Tiffany & Co., Nike, Pepsi Co., Home Depot, MLB, NHL, NFL, Budweiser, Clear Channel, Riviera Broadcast Group, CBS Interactive, Emmis Interactive, and Fox Sports, as well as many others.I am a virtuoso with Adobe Creative Suite, Adobe Experience Design, Sketch, Zeplin, Final Cut Pro. I am versed in HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, PHP, AS3, gitHub, Coda, and Sublime Text. Exploring ideas in Angular 2, Meteor, React JS, CSS3  High Performance Animation techniques, Amazon Reshift, Elastic Beanstalk, Key Management, Kinesis, Lambda, CloudWatch, and ElastiCache.Specialties: UX/UI, Experienced executive with management training from Dr. Rodger Hendrix (Hendrix Consulting), Center for Sales Strategy (CSS), Dale Carnegie (Corporate Training), Google and Yahoo! User Experience Design Training.**Many of the dates listed in my Linkedin experience below overlap due to mergers during my tenure with the companies. The radio/TV/entertainment industry is like so many others that have gone through consolidation mergers over the last 17 years.
name: Anthony Conti
title: Chief Creative Officer | Serial Innovator | Official Judge of The 22nd Annual Webby Awards
